option.adaptivebrightness.max_gamma.tool: The maximum brightness value the mod will set
option.adaptivebrightness.min_gamma.tool: The minimum brightness value the mod will set
option.adaptivebrightness.disabled.toolt: Disables the mod and makes brightness fixed again
option.adaptivebrightness.max_lightlevel: The brightness will reach its maximum value at this light level
option.adaptivebrightness.min_lightlevel: The brightness will reach its minimum value at this light level
